TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataGridColumn extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public MustInherit Class DataGridColumn Implements IStateManager
public ref class DataGridColumn abstract : System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 作為 控制項之不同資料行類型的基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the base class for the different column types of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是所有的資料行類型的基底類別控制項。The class is the base class for all column types of the control. 它會定義的屬性和通用於所有資料行類型的方法。It defines the properties and methods that are common to all column types. 執行個體類別不會直接建立。An instance of the class is not created directly.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize an instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 此類別的執行個體通常不會建立直接。Instances of this class are typically not created directly. 它是所有的資料行型別類別中定義的屬性和方法的通用基底類別。It is a base class that defines the properties and methods common to all column type classes.

summary.span: 取得值，指出資料行是否處在設計模式中。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the column is in design mode.

value.span: 如果在設計模式中，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the column is in design mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以程式設計方式決定資料行是否在設計模式中的屬性。Use the property to programmatically determine whether the column is in design mode. 如需有關設計模式的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about design mode, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property FooterStyle As TableItemStyle

summary.span: 取得資料行行尾區段的樣式屬性。

span.span: Gets the style properties for the footer section of the column.

value.span: ，包含資料行之行尾區段的樣式屬性。

span.span: A that contains the style properties for the footer section of the column.

value.span: 預設值是空的 。

span.span: The default value is an empty .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可以用於頁尾區段的資料行提供的自訂樣式。Use this property to provide a custom style for the footer section of the column. 可調整的常用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的樣式增強中的資料行的外觀控制項。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the column in the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來設定資料行尾區段的樣式屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to set the style properties for the footer section of the column. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridColumnFooterStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridColumnFooterStyle/CS/datagridcolumnfooterstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridColumnFooterStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridColumnFooterStyle/VB/datagridcolumnfooterstylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示於資料行行尾區段的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text displayed in the footer section of the column.

value.span: 顯示於資料行行尾區段的文字。

span.span: The text displayed in the footer section of the column.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定或判斷頁尾區段的資料行中顯示的文字。Use the property to specify or determine the text displayed in the footer section of the column. > [!CAUTION] > 文字不是 HTML 編碼之前它會顯示在頁尾區段的資料行。Text is not HTML-encoded before it is displayed in the footer section of the column. 這可讓您可以在文字中嵌入 HTML 標記中的指令碼。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果使用動態使用者輸入來設定這個屬性，請務必驗證值以減少安全性弱點。If this property is set dynamically using user input, be sure to validate the value to reduce security vulnerabilities. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定頁尾區段的資料行中顯示的文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the text displayed in the footer section of the column. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridColumnFooterText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridColumnFooterText/CS/datagridcolumnfootertextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridColumnFooterText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridColumnFooterText/VB/datagridcolumnfootertextvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定要顯示於資料行行首區段的影像位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of an image to display in the header section of the column.

value.span: 要顯示於資料行行首區段的影像位置。

span.span: The location of an image to display in the header section of the column.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要在資料行的標頭區段中顯示影像的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL of an image to display in the header section of the column. 您可以使用相對或絕對的 URL。You can use a relative or an absolute URL. 相對的 URL 與相關的網頁位置的映像的位置，但未指定伺服器上的完整路徑。A relative URL relates the location of the image to the location of the Web page without specifying a complete path on the server. 路徑是相對於網頁的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 這可讓您更輕鬆地將整個網站到另一個目錄移伺服器上，而不需要更新程式碼中的映像的路徑。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the image in code. 絕對 URL 會提供的完整路徑，所以移動到另一個目錄的站台需要更新程式碼。An absolute URL provides the complete path, so moving the site to another directory requires updating the code. > [!NOTE] > 如果您想要顯示文字取代其影像資料行的標頭區段中，設定而不是這個屬性的屬性。If you want to display text instead of an image in the header section of the column, set the property instead of this property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定資料行的標頭區段中顯示的影像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the image displayed in the header section of the column. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridColumnHeaderImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridColumnHeaderImageUrl/CS/datagridcolumnheaderimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridColumnHeaderImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridColumnHeaderImageUrl/VB/datagridcolumnheaderimageurlvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定或判斷資料行的標頭區段中顯示的文字。Use the property to specify or determine the text displayed in the header section of the column. 如果您想要顯示的映像，而不是文字資料行的標頭區段中，設定而不是這個屬性的屬性。If you want to display an image instead of text in the header section of the column, set the property instead of this property. > [!CAUTION] > 文字不是 HTML 編碼之前它會顯示在資料行的標頭區段。Text is not HTML-encoded before it is displayed in the header section of the column. 這可讓您可以在文字中嵌入 HTML 標記中的指令碼。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果使用動態使用者輸入來設定這個屬性，請務必驗證值以減少安全性弱點。If this property is set dynamically using user input, be sure to validate the value to reduce security vulnerabilities. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定資料行的標頭區段的文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the text for the header section of the column. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Initialize() cil managed
abstract member Initialize : unit -> unit override this.Initialize : unit -> unit

summary.span: 提供基底實作，將衍生自 類別的資料行重設為其初始的狀態。

span.span: Provides the base implementation to reset a column derived from the class to its initial state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會重設資料行衍生自基底實作類別設為初始狀態。The method provides the base implementation to reset a column derived from the class to its initial state. 這個方法不是直接被呼叫。This method is not called directly. 相反地，此方法繼承自衍生的資料行類別，然後可以用來重設衍生類型的資料行。Instead, this method is inherited by a derived column class, which can then be used to reset a column of the derived type. 您可以選擇性地覆寫這個方法在衍生的類別，以提供自訂的初始化常式。You can optionally override this method in the derived class to provide a custom initialization routine. 此基底實作重設為衍生自的所有資料行類型的通用屬性覆寫的方法通常呼叫方法類別。This base implementation of the method is often called from the overridden method to reset properties common to all column types derived from the class. 方法通常稱為期間資料繫結，繫結在第一個資料列之前。The method is usually called during data binding, prior to the first row being bound. 當方法，設計模式中的資料行設定為`true`。When the method is used, the design mode of the column is set to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 控制項開發人員通常會使用這個方法。This method is commonly used by control developers.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void InitializeCell (System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell cell, int columnIndex, System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType itemType);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void InitializeCell(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell cell, int32 columnIndex, valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType itemType) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub InitializeCell (cell As TableCell, columnIndex As Integer, itemType As ListItemType)
public: virtual void InitializeCell(System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableCell ^ cell, int columnIndex, System::Web::UI::WebControls::ListItemType itemType);

abstract member InitializeCell : System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell * int * System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType -> unit override this.InitializeCell : System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell * int * System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType -> unit

span.span: A that represents the cell to reset.

param.name: columnIndex
param.span: 儲存格所在的資料行數。

span.span: The column number where the cell is located.
One of the values.

summary.span: 提供基底實作，將衍生自 類別之資料行的指定之儲存格重設為其初始狀態。

span.span: Provides the base implementation to reset the specified cell from a column derived from the class to its initial state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會提供重設資料行衍生自指定之儲存格的基底實作類別設為初始狀態。The method provides the base implementation to reset the specified cell from a column derived from the class to its initial state. 這個方法不是直接被呼叫。This method is not called directly. 相反地，此方法繼承自衍生的資料行類別，然後可以用來重設的衍生類型的資料行中的資料格。Instead, this method is inherited by a derived column class, which can then be used to reset a cell in the column of the derived type. 您可以選擇性地覆寫這個方法在衍生的類別，以提供自訂的初始化常式。You can optionally override this method in the derived class to provide a custom initialization routine. 此基底實作重設為衍生自資料行中的所有儲存格的通用屬性覆寫的方法通常呼叫方法類別。This base implementation of the method is often called from the overridden method to reset properties common to all cells in columns derived from the class. 在此實作中，方法會重設的頁首和頁尾儲存格。In this implementation, the method resets only the header and footer cells. 這個方法不會影響其他類型的資料格。Other types of cells are not affected by this method. 當啟用排序 (藉由設定屬性，以`true`)、控制項，會依預設加入至標頭資料格。When sorting is enabled (by setting the property to `true`), a control is added to the header cell by default. 這可讓您的資料行排序時按一下控制項時。This allows you to sort the column when the control is clicked. 如果您指定的標題儲存格的影像 (藉由設定屬性)，則改為建立控制項。If you specify an image for the header cell (by setting the property), an control is created instead. 排序停用時，所指定的文字屬性會顯示在標頭資料格。When sorting is disabled, the text specified by the property is displayed in the header cell. 如果您指定的標題儲存格的影像 (藉由設定屬性)，則控制項加入至標頭資料格。If you specify an image for the header cell (by setting the property), an control is added to the header cell. 因為如果中的映像不會顯示在標頭資料格，瀏覽器不會顯示空白的儲存格，而屬性未設定，不分行空格 HTML 實體 (` `) 會顯示在標頭資料格。Because a browser will not display an empty cell, if an image in not displayed in the header cell and the property is not set, a nonbreaking space HTML entity (` `) is displayed in the header cell. 同樣地，如果頁尾資料格並沒有任何內容 (如果屬性未設定)，不分行空格 HTML 實體會顯示在頁尾資料格。Similarly, if the footer cell does not have any content (if the property is not set), a nonbreaking space HTML entity is displayed in the footer cell. > [!NOTE] > 控制項開發人員通常會使用這個方法。This method is commonly used by control developers.

[!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridColumnItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridColumnItemStyle/CS/datagridcolumnitemstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridColumnItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridColumnItemStyle/VB/datagridcolumnitemstylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 載入 物件的狀態。

span.span: Loads the state of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定的自訂伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 使用方法以載入的狀態物件。Use the method to load the state of the object. 這可讓資料行執行自訂的檢視狀態管理。This allows a column to perform custom view-state management.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定或判斷要傳遞給欄位的名稱方法來排序選取資料行時。Use the property to specify or determine the name of the field to pass to the method when a column is selected for sorting. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不是繫結資料行中資料來源的欄位。This property does not bind the column to a field in data source. 若要繫結欄位的資料行，請參閱特定資料行類型的文件。To bind a column to a field, see the documentation for the specific column type. 啟用排序時，控制項呈現在標題區段的每個資料行其中屬性設定。When sorting is enabled, controls are rendered in the heading section of each column where the property is set. > [!NOTE] > 當屬性設定為`true`，則每個資料行中的屬性繫結至資料行的欄位名稱會自動設定支援資料繫結的控制項。When the property is set to `true`, the property for each column in the control that supports data binding is automatically set with the field name bound to the column. 如果屬性設定為`false`，您需要手動設定與欄位名稱的屬性繫結至您想要啟用 排序的每個資料行的資料行。If the property is set to `false`, you need to manually set the property with the field name bound to the column for each column that you want to enable sorting for. 這些控制項可讓您排序所選取的資料行的控制項。These controls allow you to sort the control by the selected column. 當按一下資料行時，控制就會引發事件。When a control for a column is clicked, the event is raised. 值選定資料行的屬性會傳遞至一部分的事件處理常式物件。The value of the property for the selected column is passed to the event handler as part of the object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要用來排序的欄位名稱。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the field name to use for sorting. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridColumnSortExpression#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridColumnSortExpression/CS/datagridcolumnsortexpressioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridColumnSortExpression#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridColumnSortExpression/VB/datagridcolumnsortexpressionvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 導致對伺服器控制項的檢視狀態變更的追蹤 (Tracking)，以便它們能夠儲存於伺服器控制項的 物件。
